LightningComponentBundle.description: A checkbox to confirm a statement as true or false

property.name: fieldId
property.label: Field Id
property.description: Field Id - must be unique to this process

property.name: headinglabel
property.label: Heading Label
property.description: Please provide heading label to be shown above all checkboxes

property.name: headinghint
property.label: Heading Hint
property.description: Please provide heading hint to be shown above all checkboxes

property.name: headingFontSize
property.label: Heading Label Font Size
property.description: Heading Label Font Size - Small, Medium or Large

property.name: labels
property.label: Checkbox Labels
property.description: A comma separated list of labels for the checkboxes (Property,Bank Account,Shares. Not required if using Checkbox Picklist Field

property.name: picklistField
property.label: Checkbox Picklist Field
property.description: The API name of a picklist to get the labels and values from in the form of SObjectName.FieldName.

property.name: booleanValues
property.label: Unassigned
property.description: Do not use as not currently utilised

property.name: errorMessage
property.label: Error Message for Checkbox
property.description: Error Message

property.name: outputValue
property.label: Selected Values
property.description: The values of the checkboxes selected in MSP variable format (Property;Bank Account)

property.name: outputValueBoolean
property.label: Selected Values Boolean
property.description: The boolean values of the checkboxes selected in a Flow text variable format (true;true;false). Can be used as input to Checkbox Values field to re-display choices a user has previously selected.

property.name: outputValueCollection
property.label: Selected Values Collection
property.description: The values of the checkboxes selected in collection variable format (Property, Bank Account as multiple entries in a Flow collection variable). Used to facilitate manipulation of choices made, for example to loop through selected values.

property.name: required
property.label: Is required
property.description: If true, at least once checkbox must be selected (true) by the user;

property.name: smallerCheckboxes
property.label: Smaller Checkbox Options?
property.description: Choose to display checkboxes in smaller size

property.name: fieldIdText
property.label: Field Id for text Input
property.description: Field Id - must be unique to this process

property.name: label
property.label: Label
property.description: The label to display

property.name: value
property.label: Value from Inputfield
property.description: The Value

property.name: errorMessageInput
property.label: Error Message Input
property.description: Error Message

property.name: requiredInput
property.label: Required input
property.description: Is a value required to submit the form?

property.name: maxCharacterCount
property.label: Maximum Character Count
property.description: The maximum length of the string in the field

property.name: showCharacterCount
property.label: Show Character Count
property.description: Shows the user the character count and the maximum character count

property.name: rowCount
property.label: No of rows to display
property.description: Default no of rows to display in the text area

property.name: regexPattern
property.label: Regular Expression
property.description: The regular expression the field should conform to

property.name: prefix
property.label: Value Prefix for text input only
property.description: The prefix before the value

property.name: suffix
property.label: Value Suffix for text input only
property.description: The suffix after the value

property.name: visibilityValue
property.label: Visibility Value
property.description: the value that would allow the component to be visible.(ex yes on radiobox)

property.name: hint
property.label: Hint for Input Field
property.description: Input field hint

property.name: textinputType
property.label: Text Input Type
property.description: Enter 1 for text Input, 2 for text Area
